options: A. They never lead to cancerous cells.

options: To multiply copies of DNA molecule

question: The optimum temperature of enzymes found in thermophilic bacteria is: Options: Lower than for enzymes in the human body., Higher than for enzymes in the human body., The same as enzymes found in human body., Lower than enzymes found in warm blooded animals.

Higher than for enzymes in the human body.
The same as enzymes found in human body.

flies appear spontaneously on rotting meat kept in closed or open jars alike.
